name: vardict
description: Get a dictionary consisting of CLI arguments
author: Mohammad Abdul Ahad Chowdhury

scripts.test: tsc && node out/vardict.test.js --name 'Anirudha Paul' --age 25 --single -c 'Samsung R&D' --home Mymensingh --coolWithLadies false -wantsToGoTo=USA --IELTS=7.5 --favoriteFood kachchi -nick-name Prasun
